Name: Maryborough Wide Bay and Burnett Historical Society Inc

About.Hours & facilities: Open Wed and Fri 9am-12pm, Thurs 9am-1pm. Reference assistance available in person and by mail. Copying services available for books, journals and original records to A3. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit required for access outside normal hours. Proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: Historical photographs and written records of local historical interest.

About.Major holdings: School of Arts Library: Books, general 1840- (100m). Member submissions: Historical Records 1840- (5m). Photographs: 1870-(5m).
